Name: Regina Blitz Household Towel, 560 Super-Sized Sheets, Triple Layered Strength, 8 Rolls
Reviews: This is a really good product. It's very absorbent and very economical in use as a result.It's been  a essential in our household for a while and we have discovered all sorts of uses for it - mainly variations on the theme of mopping up spills,  as a substitute for cloths for cleaning work surfaces, for cleaning/polishing glassware but I've also used it to clean my specs,  apply polish to wood, car polish to my car and I've found it works great to staunch blood flow whilst I scrabble around for a sticking plaster.We buy 8 rolls a month via Amazon subscribe and save which makes for a more economic purchase than using any other source we know of.  I'm always amazed how we manage to get through that many rolls in a typical month but we do - amazingly we even had to buy a couple of extra rolls from a local supermarket over Christmas. So we are great fans.We are NOT great fans of Amazon's method of packing this stuff for delivery.We had our monthly delivery of subscribe and save items yesterday and today.  Both deliveries came via a Amazon e-van. Whilst I don't entirely believe the propoganda re electric vehicles, broadly speaking I guess this is better than diesel and also good for Amazon's eco credentials.Saturday's delivery included a pack of 48 Andrex toilet rolls. This pack has aprroximately twice the volume occupied by the Regina kitchen towel 8 pack.  The Andrex loo rolls just  came shrink wrapped with  a label identifying me and my address.  This is definitely eco-friendly as packaging was minimal.Today's  (and previous deliveries) of the Regina product use packagng which verges on the absurd.As previously. the kitchen rolls arrived packed in a huge cardboard box of roughly twice the volume needed. Even more absurd, the unused space was filled with something like 25 yards of paper wrap. Amazon PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE stop this nonsense.  It's wholly unneccesary, definitley eco-unfriendly and also wastes my time as I have to cut up all this redundant packaging so that it can fit it in our green bin - and and it takes up far too much volume in the latter.Could someone explain why Regina kitchen towels need to be hidden from prying eyes in a box whilst the toilet rolls - being wrapped in transaprent plastic - are not.  Are pilferers so selective?
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 February 2024

Name: Regina Blitz Household Towel, 560 Super-Sized Sheets, Triple Layered Strength, 8 Rolls
Reviews: This is very useful for mopping up spills on kitchen floor as it is fairly thick and strong.  I sometimes use it to wipe kitchen sink and, or, collect debris from kitchen sink drain.  I also use it on a tray for catching drink and food spills.  As it has good strength I sometimes use it for drying my washed hands in the kitchen.  I find it a useful adaptable paper product.

Name: Regina Blitz Household Towel, 560 Super-Sized Sheets, Triple Layered Strength, 8 Rolls
Reviews: I am a loyal Regina Blitz customer, and I can confidently say that I will continue to choose this kitchen roll over others. The long-lasting quality and cost-effective nature of this product make it a staple in my kitchen, and I highly recommend it to anyone in search of a reliable and efficient kitchen/household roll.One of the standout features of the Regina Blitz Household Towel is its remarkable durability and consistent performance. Unlike other brands that seem to change with every iteration, Regina Blitz has remained steadfast in delivering exceptional quality over the years. From spills to general cleaning, this household product does exactly what it claims to do, and it continues to impress me with its strength, super absorbency, and overall fuss-free functionality.Having experienced the unparalleled effectiveness, I can confidently say that it's a product you don't want to miss out on. The initial price may seem steep, but the long-term cost-effectiveness is undeniable. The value and performance justify the investment, especially when purchasing through Amazon, where the price is more than justified for the quantity and quality you receive.It's worth noting that Regina Blitz offers other products similar to this one, but based on my experience, they don't quite match up in terms of quality. Don't be swayed by imitations; stick with the original Regina Blitz Household Towel for the superior performance you deserve.

This is definitely eco-friendly as packaging was minimal.Today's  (and previous deliveries) of the Regina product use packagng which verges on the absurd.As previously. the kitchen rolls arrived packed in a huge cardboard box of roughly twice the volume needed. Even more absurd, the unused space was filled with something like 25 yards of paper wrap. Amazon PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE stop this nonsense.  It's wholly unneccesary, definitley eco-unfriendly and also wastes my time as I have to cut up all this redundant packaging so that it can fit it in our green bin - and and it takes up far too much volume in the latter.Could someone explain why Regina kitchen towels need to be hidden from prying eyes in a box whilst the toilet rolls - being wrapped in transaprent plastic - are not.  Are pilferers so selective?

Name: Vitabiotics Ultra Vitamin D Tablets 1000IU Optimum Level -96 count (Pack of 1)
Reviews: If you are looking for a vitamin D supplement that provides optimum strength and supports your immune system, bones, teeth, and muscles, you might want to consider Ultra Vitamin D by Vitabiotics. This product contains 1000 IU of vitamin D3, the preferred form of vitamin D that is easily absorbed by the body. It also comes in a convenient tablet form that you can take once a day with your main meal.Pros:+ Vitamin D plays a vital role in many aspects of health, especially in regions where sunlight exposure is limited or during winter months.+ Ultra Vitamin D provides effective levels of vitamin D3 that can help maintain normal immune function, cell division, and muscle function.+ It is suitable for vegetarians and has no artificial colours, preservatives, salt, yeast, or lactose.+ It has a compact by design certification, which means it has less packaging and carbon footprint than other products.+ It is affordable and easy to order online from Amazon.Cons:- Ultra Vitamin D may not be suitable for people who have allergies to any of the ingredients or who are taking certain medications. You should always consult your doctor or pharmacist before using any supplement.- It may not provide enough vitamin D for people who have very low levels or who have certain medical conditions. You should always check your vitamin D status with a blood test and follow your doctor‚Äôs advice on the appropriate dosage.- It may cause side effects such as nausea, headache, or allergic reactions in some people. You should stop taking it and seek medical attention if you experience any adverse reactions.Reasons to buy:* You want to boost your vitamin D intake and support your overall health and well-being.* You prefer a tablet form of vitamin D that is easy to swallow and convenient to take.* You care about the environment and want to choose a product that has less impact on the planet.Reasons to avoid:* You have allergies or sensitivities to any of the ingredients in Ultra Vitamin D.* You are taking medications that may interact with vitamin D or affect its absorption or metabolism.* You have very low or very high levels of vitamin D or other medical conditions that require a different dosage or form of vitamin D.Conclusion:Ultra Vitamin D is a great supplement for anyone who wants to increase their vitamin D intake and support their health and immunity. It provides effective levels of vitamin D3 in a tablet form that is easy to take and environmentally friendly. However, it may not be suitable for everyone and you should always consult your doctor or pharmacist before using it. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a quality vitamin D supplement that is affordable and convenient.

Name: Vitabiotics Ultra Vitamin D Tablets 1000IU Optimum Level -96 count (Pack of 1)
Reviews: Vitamin D plays a most important role in maintaining a healthy condition in  many parts of the body and its immune system.  It was recommended to this reviewer by a GP, primarily to maintain healthy bones. So too, Vitamin D provides an effective way of obtaining vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol), an important factor in maintaining muscle health.The recommendation from Vitabiotics is that the supplement is taken at the level of 1 pill per day - taken with water at, preferably, a regular time slot. There is no distaste or after taste with the pill. The dose to be taken, along with information about the product's strength, is available for reading from the box containing the product. It is also stated that the product is safe to take along with most other multi nutrient health supplements - also available from Vitabiotics.The product is at budget price and has 96 pills in the package under review. - that works out at around 5 pence per pill, an excellent bargain for the health benefits obtained. The product is readily available for ordering and repetition. Highly recommended.

It also comes in a convenient tablet form that you can take once a day with your main meal.Pros:+ Vitamin D plays a vital role in many aspects of health, especially in regions where sunlight exposure is limited or during winter months.+ Ultra Vitamin D provides effective levels of vitamin D3 that can help maintain normal immune function, cell division, and muscle function.+ It is suitable for vegetarians and has no artificial colours, preservatives, salt, yeast, or lactose.+ It has a compact by design certification, which means it has less packaging and carbon footprint than other products.+ It is affordable and easy to order online from Amazon.Cons:- Ultra Vitamin D may not be suitable for people who have allergies to any of the ingredients or who are taking certain medications. You should always consult your doctor or pharmacist before using any supplement.- It may not provide enough vitamin D for people who have very low levels or who have certain medical conditions. You should always check your vitamin D status with a blood test and follow your doctor‚Äôs advice on the appropriate dosage.- It may cause side effects such as nausea, headache, or allergic reactions in some people. You should stop taking it and seek medical attention if you experience any adverse reactions.Reasons to buy:* You want to boost your vitamin D intake and support your overall health and well-being.* You prefer a tablet form of vitamin D that is easy to swallow and convenient to take.* You care about the environment and want to choose a product that has less impact on the planet.Reasons to avoid:* You have allergies or sensitivities to any of the ingredients in Ultra Vitamin D.* You are taking medications that may interact with vitamin D or affect its absorption or metabolism.* You have very low or very high levels of vitamin D or other medical conditions that require a different dosage or form of vitamin D.Conclusion:Ultra Vitamin D is a great supplement for anyone who wants to increase their vitamin D intake and support their health and immunity. It provides effective levels of vitamin D3 in a tablet form that is easy to take and environmentally friendly. However, it may not be suitable for everyone and you should always consult your doctor or pharmacist before using it. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a quality vitamin D supplement that is affordable and convenient.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 June 2023

Name: Vitabiotics Ultra Vitamin D Tablets 1000IU Optimum Level -96 count (Pack of 1)

It is also stated that the product is safe to take along with most other multi nutrient health supplements - also available from Vitabiotics.The product is at budget price and has 96 pills in the package under review. - that works out at around 5 pence per pill, an excellent bargain for the health benefits obtained. The product is readily available for ordering and repetition. Highly recommended.

Name: aZengear Emergency Survival Poncho (4pc) Thermal Mylar Foil Coating Blanket for Heat Retention and Rain | Reversible with Hood | Waterproof, Windproof, Portable, Hands-free, Outdoor Kit
Reviews: Just like an emergency space blanket you see on the news, these are just as effective but can be worn like a poncho rather than wrapped around.They come in a small packet, making them easy to store and carry with you should the situation arise that you need one.They are well made, unlikely to tear, and having worn one for an hour to see the effect, I can confirm they are VERY warming and comforting.Uses could be out on a boat, car breakdown in winter, hiking on mountains, or just to keep around the home for power cuts in snow.They are not single use either - so work out even better value than first appearance.

Name: Lewis-Plast Premium First Aid Kit For Home Car Holiday And Workplace - Includes Bandages, Eye Pods, Ice Packs And Essentials For Everyday Situations, 90 Count (Pack of 1)
Reviews: This is actually the second one of these I have purchased over the past couple of years as I wanted one for upstairs  and downstairs due to having mobility issues and needing to use a starlit I felt that should anything happen and I was unable to get downstairs in time it made sense having already bought one previously I went for the same knowing I could trust it to have what I required. Ideal for homes and small businesses alike and a good price. Would recommend this for both and probs for caravaning or camping and even travelling abroad as it is small and compact but contains alot. Excellent and would buy again.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 February 2024

Name: Lewis-Plast Premium First Aid Kit For Home Car Holiday And Workplace - Includes Bandages, Eye Pods, Ice Packs And Essentials For Everyday Situations, 90 Count (Pack of 1)
Reviews: Good value for money. Well packed and lightweight. Comprehensive contents that I will add too i.e. tube of antiseptic cream, a better pair of scissors, painkillers etc. Was confused at first (as others are looking at the 1 star reviews) with the dates on some of the contents which appeared to show that they were out of date. Rang the parent company that supply Amazon, who are an established reputable medical supplier, and they explained that, those contents that are 'sterile', will have a date when the item was packed (alongside a picture of a building) AND an expiry date (alongside a picture of an egg timer). Picture attached. If the items are not sterile however, then they will NOT have an expiry date, just a date when they were packed. Have suggested that the company put a note to that effect in their packs which they will take on board moving forward.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 February 2024

Name: Lewis-Plast Premium First Aid Kit For Home Car Holiday And Workplace - Includes Bandages, Eye Pods, Ice Packs And Essentials For Everyday Situations, 90 Count (Pack of 1)

Name: Dr. Beckmann Carpet Stain Remover | Removes New and Dried-in Stains | Includes Applicator Brush, 650 ml
Reviews: I‚Äôve tried many different products to remove stains, but none of them worked as well as this one. Dr. Beckmann Carpet Stain Remover is amazing. It removes new and dried-in stains, even the ones that have been there for months. It works on all kinds of stains, such as coffee, wine, mud, chocolate, and more. It also eliminates odors and leaves a fresh scent.The product comes with a 650 ml bottle and an applicator brush. The bottle has a nozzle that allows you to spray the product directly on the stain. The applicator brush has stiff bristles that help to scrub the stain and lift it off the carpet fibers. The product is easy to use and doesn‚Äôt require any rinsing or vacuuming. You just spray, brush, and blot with a clean cloth. The stain disappears in minutes.The only thing I don‚Äôt like about this product is that it‚Äôs quite expensive. However, I think it‚Äôs worth it, because it saves me time and money in the long run. I don‚Äôt have to hire a professional carpet cleaner or replace my carpets. I can keep them looking new and clean with this product.Overall, this is a fantastic product for anyone who has carpets and pets or kids. It removes stains quickly and effectively, and it‚Äôs easy to use. It‚Äôs a miracle worker for stubborn carpet stains. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who needs a reliable carpet cleaner.

It removes new and dried-in stains, even the ones that have been there for months. It works on all kinds of stains, such as coffee, wine, mud, chocolate, and more. It also eliminates odors and leaves a fresh scent.The product comes with a 650 ml bottle and an applicator brush. The bottle has a nozzle that allows you to spray the product directly on the stain. The applicator brush has stiff bristles that help to scrub the stain and lift it off the carpet fibers. The product is easy to use and doesn‚Äôt require any rinsing or vacuuming. You just spray, brush, and blot with a clean cloth. The stain disappears in minutes.The only thing I don‚Äôt like about this product is that it‚Äôs quite expensive. However, I think it‚Äôs worth it, because it saves me time and money in the long run. I don‚Äôt have to hire a professional carpet cleaner or replace my carpets. I can keep them looking new and clean with this product.Overall, this is a fantastic product for anyone who has carpets and pets or kids. It removes stains quickly and effectively, and it‚Äôs easy to use. It‚Äôs a miracle worker for stubborn carpet stains. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who needs a reliable carpet cleaner.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 December 2023

machine

Name: Dr. Beckmann Carpet Stain Remover | Removes New and Dried-in Stains | Includes Applicator Brush, 650 ml
Reviews: As my title eludes to... my toddler somehow managed to smear make up into my cream carper. Absolute nightmare. Enter Dr Beckman's carpet cleaner. Did a magnificent job considering I avoided the mess for a food few days before scrubbing this into the carpet.It works, it lifted the stain brilliantly, the best way I've found it to rub this in (as per the bottle) and then really heavily dab a cloth (or baby wipes in my case) and the foam lifts the stain out into the cloth.

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)
Reviews: Good multifuction product. The only dislike is that the draw string spring is a little loose. Other than that it works perfect. The flint was good, the strike was nice and sharp so you could easily scrap some wood the strike the flint for a fire. I mean it was ‚Ç¨12 for two of them so if you are living in the wild you probably would buy something better but I hike regularly and have taken it on 5 hikes now and have used it to navigate each hike when my phone signal was down. Overall it is a good product and comfortable to wear.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 February 2024

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)
Reviews: Since I bought this item, I've only ever taken this off to do the dishes or get a wash. It's a brilliant yet simple piece of survival kit you never know you'll need. "Better to have something you don't need than to need it and not have it." Are the words I live by.Every piece of this gear works as intended, the compass (when unclipped) actually works and points in the correct direction, my kids love grabbing my arm and blowing the whistle, so that's getting some use and driving the missy insane. I'm glad to know I can always start a fire if a survival situation should ever arrive with the flint scraper and rod. I find it very comfortable to wear and most often forget it's even there. Worth every penny, and best to be safe!The only issue I have, is the wrist toggle, while I appreciate that you can increase or decrease the size of the wrist length, the toggle is a bit weak and keeps losing up, but thats an easy fix for me.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 February 2024

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)
Reviews: The band is quite sturdy and adjustable , can't figure out how you would undo the paracord though , the ferrous and steel did manage to ignite some flaked up toilet paper , so that's a plus . The steel saw says removable but I cannot remove it as it appears glued in , which brings me to the compass , the compass will only give a true reading when the wrist band is separated as the saw/steel for the ignitor is too close to the compass and effects it like a magnet . Once you separate the 2 ends clipped together and put some distance between the metal and the compass it works just fine . The whistle is very basic as expected . Given that an all black band and a black and orange band are included , basically getting 2 for the price of one , I can't complain. It all does what it should do really , although positioning of the ignitor steel would have been better placed away from the compass.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 February 2024

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)
Reviews: Great for outdoor kids, everything they need to start a fire or cut some wood plus other stuff, looks cool too.

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)
Reviews: Brilliant concept and outstanding value for money at under ¬£5 each. The fire starter does produce a spark although it isn't as large or easy as the one shown in the video although maybe I just need more practice.I've seen a few comments referencing that the compass doesn't appear to work, which it does but there is a slight issue.The metal blade built into the clip which attaches to the compass section interferes with it and causes the north to constantly point towards the metal which makes the compass appear to be broken when in fact it is just being overridden by the metal of the blade.This means that when the clip is undone it is a perfectly operational piece of equipment that is able to quickly reposition itself as you move but as soon as you wear it the metal overrides it and the north becomes frozen.Excluding the compass issue this appears the be an outstanding piece of equipment which is very lightweight and portable, some parts are a little wonky but at this price for two items you can't complain.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 February 2024

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)
Reviews: Good multifuction product. The only dislike is that the draw string spring is a little loose. Other than that it works perfect. The flint was good, the strike was nice and sharp so you could easily scrap some wood the strike the flint for a fire. I mean it was ‚Ç¨12 for two of them so if you are living in the wild you probably would buy something better but I hike regularly and have taken it on 5 hikes now and have used it to navigate each hike when my phone signal was down. Overall it is a good product and comfortable to wear.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 February 2024

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)
Reviews: Since I bought this item, I've only ever taken this off to do the dishes or get a wash. It's a brilliant yet simple piece of survival kit you never know you'll need. "Better to have something you don't need than to need it and not have it." Are the words I live by.Every piece of this gear works as intended, the compass (when unclipped) actually works and points in the correct direction, my kids love grabbing my arm and blowing the whistle, so that's getting some use and driving the missy insane. I'm glad to know I can always start a fire if a survival situation should ever arrive with the flint scraper and rod. I find it very comfortable to wear and most often forget it's even there. Worth every penny, and best to be safe!The only issue I have, is the wrist toggle, while I appreciate that you can increase or decrease the size of the wrist length, the toggle is a bit weak and keeps losing up, but thats an easy fix for me.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 February 2024

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)
Reviews: The band is quite sturdy and adjustable , can't figure out how you would undo the paracord though , the ferrous and steel did manage to ignite some flaked up toilet paper , so that's a plus . The steel saw says removable but I cannot remove it as it appears glued in , which brings me to the compass , the compass will only give a true reading when the wrist band is separated as the saw/steel for the ignitor is too close to the compass and effects it like a magnet . Once you separate the 2 ends clipped together and put some distance between the metal and the compass it works just fine . The whistle is very basic as expected . Given that an all black band and a black and orange band are included , basically getting 2 for the price of one , I can't complain. It all does what it should do really , although positioning of the ignitor steel would have been better placed away from the compass.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 February 2024

Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 February 2024

Name: aZengear Paracord Survival Bracelet (2 Pack) | Flint Steel Fire Starter, Compass, Whistle,Hiking Accessories, Wild Camping Equipment Kit, Bushcraft, Emergency (Black and Orange)
Reviews: Brilliant concept and outstanding value for money at under ¬£5 each. The fire starter does produce a spark although it isn't as large or easy as the one shown in the video although maybe I just need more practice.I've seen a few comments referencing that the compass doesn't appear to work, which it does but there is a slight issue.The metal blade built into the clip which attaches to the compass section interferes with it and causes the north to constantly point towards the metal which makes the compass appear to be broken when in fact it is just being overridden by the metal of the blade.This means that when the clip is undone it is a perfectly operational piece of equipment that is able to quickly reposition itself as you move but as soon as you wear it the metal overrides it and the north becomes frozen.Excluding the compass issue this appears the be an outstanding piece of equipment which is very lightweight and portable, some parts are a little wonky but at this price for two items you can't complain.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 February 2024

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: Would recommend, perfect size. Belt clip has a Velcro and stud to ensure this stays secure.I‚Äôve added additional plasters and paracetamol, Ibuprofen too, there‚Äôs even room for a chapstick. There‚Äôs is a little additional space for these items if you cut the tablet to size.A really handy piece of kit for the car, walking or travelling about. Handy to have around the home too.Well worth the price, love how everything packs in so well. Bought this over the more robust kits on Amazon as this stands up to BSE standards.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 June 2020

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: I bought this for a bug out bag and it has everything I would expect or need from a compact first aid kit.Components seem good quality and it fits inside the fixed side pocket of a Maxpedition Monsoon backpack perfectly although it is a tight fit - certainly no room for anything else in there.I chose this kit specifically for that pocket and although the stated size is just larger than the pocket dimensions it will squash down slightly to fit inside no problem.Very pleased with this and it was a good price too - just hope I never need to use it.....
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 October 2023

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: This is a reasonably well thought out first aid kit.Pros:Easy to carry size, with space to add your own gear in. I've added a small pill bottle (with pills containing ibuprofen, parcetamol, aspirin, anti indigestion, caffeine & antihistamine tablets), condoms, hangover sachets and waterproof plasters, with space for a couple of extra items if needed (may add an aluminium blanket & ear plugs)Cons:Would have been nice to have it waterproof, they've got the waterproof zip on it, surely it wouldn't take much of a change or cost to do so as it's such of a small item and Lifesystems do make large waterproof versions, it would be nice for them to extend this feature to the rest of their range.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 June 2020

Reviews: Nice and compact set for first aid essentials.

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: The blue tube (i.e. antiseptic cream) shown in the video is not inluded in the list, nor in the actual package. Antiseptic wipe is not going to work in the smae way as the cream if you have an open wound. And I can't return the item because the seal in the zip has to be broken to check the content. How tricky.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 August 2018

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: the pack is small and light, has everything you need for a day out. There is also a bit of room for a couple extra items to be thrown in, i.e. chapstick, hand gel and painkiller pills etc.however unlike the picture suggests, there is no antiseptic cream (15g) within the pack, and I also find the zipper to be very stiff & the pack should be designed for a better clamshell opening.

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: The blue tube (i.e. antiseptic cream) shown in the video is not inluded in the list, nor in the actual package. Antiseptic wipe is not going to work in the smae way as the cream if you have an open wound. And I can't return the item because the seal in the zip has to be broken to check the content. How tricky.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 August 2018

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: the pack is small and light, has everything you need for a day out. There is also a bit of room for a couple extra items to be thrown in, i.e. chapstick, hand gel and painkiller pills etc.however unlike the picture suggests, there is no antiseptic cream (15g) within the pack, and I also find the zipper to be very stiff & the pack should be designed for a better clamshell opening.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 January 2023

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: Would recommend, perfect size. Belt clip has a Velcro and stud to ensure this stays secure.I‚Äôve added additional plasters and paracetamol, Ibuprofen too, there‚Äôs even room for a chapstick. There‚Äôs is a little additional space for these items if you cut the tablet to size.A really handy piece of kit for the car, walking or travelling about. Handy to have around the home too.Well worth the price, love how everything packs in so well. Bought this over the more robust kits on Amazon as this stands up to BSE standards.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 June 2020

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: I bought this for a bug out bag and it has everything I would expect or need from a compact first aid kit.Components seem good quality and it fits inside the fixed side pocket of a Maxpedition Monsoon backpack perfectly although it is a tight fit - certainly no room for anything else in there.I chose this kit specifically for that pocket and although the stated size is just larger than the pocket dimensions it will squash down slightly to fit inside no problem.Very pleased with this and it was a good price too - just hope I never need to use it.....
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 October 2023

Name: Lifesystems Pocket First Aid Kit, CE Certified Contents, Specifically Designed for Hiking and Outdoor
Reviews: This is a reasonably well thought out first aid kit.Pros:Easy to carry size, with space to add your own gear in. I've added a small pill bottle (with pills containing ibuprofen, parcetamol, aspirin, anti indigestion, caffeine & antihistamine tablets), condoms, hangover sachets and waterproof plasters, with space for a couple of extra items if needed (may add an aluminium blanket & ear plugs)Cons:Would have been nice to have it waterproof, they've got the waterproof zip on it, surely it wouldn't take much of a change or cost to do so as it's such of a small item and Lifesystems do make large waterproof versions, it would be nice for them to extend this feature to the rest of their range.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 June 2020

Reviews: I don't know how I've managed without this for so long. I've been using AAA's until they run out and then replacing them. This avoids all that faff with a great batter life and quick charging.I use mine for trail running at night and it will usually give me at least four hours of good light.I would give it 5 stars but it's not cheap. I can't fault the actual unit, but if it were at a ¬£10 price point, I'd have bought more.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 October 2023

Name: Petzl Core Rechargeable Battery
Reviews: Last purchased 2018. Used sporadically. Suddenly stopped working. Tried to charge. Seemed to be successful charge as battery light changed from red to green. When battery inserted into head torch nothing. Repeated process and nothing again. The cost of the battery is quite expensive at ~¬£26. Looking at other users' comments, it seems that it is quite a common fault. Now thinking that it is not worth the money and may go back to other types of rechargeable battery. I am wrong?

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: The Good ... I got one in the end, sadly at the full ¬£13 tag, as the offer price meant you had to prove your age for some reason, nope, not for this product so I had to wait.  It's super useful for a light touch up in the field. With the rounded edge you can get your mushroom knife or similar well edged, and the groove is useful for the back edge of the point or a fishing hook. It's a touch up sharpener not a honing one.  The dual end thing is ok but no needed.The Bad ...  the price is to high, they used to be well under ¬£10 and offered at ¬£10. The top that covers the little V shaped sharpener needs to fit better and with more of a detent so you can feel it's home, sadly it comes of if you're not careful. Attention to detail, something lacking in most things these days.If you're going to sell a product at an elevated price the quality should be reflected. In all the years I've been on amazon I seen maybe on or two 5star products and this is not one of them.  As for the rating features of a product, we don't need to, it just confuses people and increases the rating.It's good but not that good. Useful but not essential. I like it, I bought it.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 February 2024

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: Tried lots of knife sharpeners for pocket knives bushcraft & kitchen knives, all of which I use most days, some were good, some a waste of money & alot of it as well, came across a you tube review of this one, which as it was victorinox got my interest, bought 2 one for field use one for home.Simple to use, borderline idiot proof & have to say I've used them on many knives & every one has finished by being as sharp or sharper than new.Ceramic part will only work on thinner bladed knives upto around 4mm dependent on grind, but simple cheap lasts well good quality 10/10 always have one handy.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 February 2024

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: Very handy size, excellent sharpener. Saves using the upturned bottom of a mug!
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 October 2023

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: Sleek but practical design.  Works really well as long as used properly (like most things really).  Easy to carry with good build quality.  If you‚Äôve never sharpened a blade before I recommend you check on YouTube so you start off correctly.  Easy to carry into the field to sharpen your Swiss Army or most other knives to be honest.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 May 2023

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: Absolutely brilliant. Very easy to use.Just ordered two more so I can keep one in the kitchen and one in my van.You can sharpen at work, in front of the telly, up a mountain, no messing with water or anything, you can use it anywhere without a bench.I've used it to great effect on Pen Knives, Pocket Knives, Kitchen Knives, Sushi Knives, Carving Knives, Hunting Knives, Cutlery Steel, Carbon Steel, Razor Steel, all no problem with excellent results.Few tips :It's not a Chef's Steel, don't try and use it like one.Here's the biggie NEVER USE IT WITH YOUR HAND IN FRONT OF THE BLADE. Sorry for shouting.Just flip the blade so the edge is away from you and hold the sharpener behind the blade.Pick your angle and sweep left and right like you're shading on a line with a pencil.Don't saw across the blade. Always run along the blade, left right, handle to tip. You don't need to do long full sweeps, just keep it even.Like this it's impossible to cut yourself or scratch the flat of the knife.As the edge apexes you'll start pushing a burr over the apex.Keep flipping sides and reducing pressure until the burr reduces to nothing.If you're not getting a good edge you are either not properly apexed yet or you're using too much pressure and knackering up the apex.The last sweeps should feel like warm butter with a feather pressure.Test the edge on a single sheet of paper, that'll show you where you need to do more work.Scrub deposits off the sharpener on cardboard or a roll of paper.If you want to polish or strop the edge afterwards use a leather belt for razor steel or leather with polishing compound on it for harder steels.Yes, you can do a faster better job with ¬£300 worth of Japanese Whetstones, but come on, are you a Sushi Chef or do you just want your knives to work properly? ü§îüòÇAnyway, this is much easier to use on smaller blades and doesn't make a mess.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 January 2024

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: Handy little sharpener with swiss army quality. Bought it for camping but find it useful in the kitchen as well .You won't be sharpening a sword with it but for the average kitchen knife it is ideal.

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: The sheath is sturdy plastic, and can be put on the other side as the handle, the ceramic sharpener is easy to use, give it a few strokes each side and the honing v is easy too, you just don't have to press,just the weight of it dragging. Haven't sharpened knives in years and had all my grandfather's are now shaving sharp and each took me a few minutes.

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: The Good ... I got one in the end, sadly at the full ¬£13 tag, as the offer price meant you had to prove your age for some reason, nope, not for this product so I had to wait.  It's super useful for a light touch up in the field. With the rounded edge you can get your mushroom knife or similar well edged, and the groove is useful for the back edge of the point or a fishing hook. It's a touch up sharpener not a honing one.  The dual end thing is ok but no needed.The Bad ...  the price is to high, they used to be well under ¬£10 and offered at ¬£10. The top that covers the little V shaped sharpener needs to fit better and with more of a detent so you can feel it's home, sadly it comes of if you're not careful. Attention to detail, something lacking in most things these days.If you're going to sell a product at an elevated price the quality should be reflected. In all the years I've been on amazon I seen maybe on or two 5star products and this is not one of them.  As for the rating features of a product, we don't need to, it just confuses people and increases the rating.It's good but not that good. Useful but not essential. I like it, I bought it.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 February 2024

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: Tried lots of knife sharpeners for pocket knives bushcraft & kitchen knives, all of which I use most days, some were good, some a waste of money & alot of it as well, came across a you tube review of this one, which as it was victorinox got my interest, bought 2 one for field use one for home.Simple to use, borderline idiot proof & have to say I've used them on many knives & every one has finished by being as sharp or sharper than new.Ceramic part will only work on thinner bladed knives upto around 4mm dependent on grind, but simple cheap lasts well good quality 10/10 always have one handy.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 February 2024

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red

Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 October 2023

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: Sleek but practical design.  Works really well as long as used properly (like most things really).  Easy to carry with good build quality.  If you‚Äôve never sharpened a blade before I recommend you check on YouTube so you start off correctly.  Easy to carry into the field to sharpen your Swiss Army or most other knives to be honest.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 May 2023

Name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife Sharpener, Dual Knife Sharpener Professional, Swiss Made, Portable, Black/Red
Reviews: Absolutely brilliant. Very easy to use.Just ordered two more so I can keep one in the kitchen and one in my van.You can sharpen at work, in front of the telly, up a mountain, no messing with water or anything, you can use it anywhere without a bench.I've used it to great effect on Pen Knives, Pocket Knives, Kitchen Knives, Sushi Knives, Carving Knives, Hunting Knives, Cutlery Steel, Carbon Steel, Razor Steel, all no problem with excellent results.Few tips :It's not a Chef's Steel, don't try and use it like one.Here's the biggie NEVER USE IT WITH YOUR HAND IN FRONT OF THE BLADE. Sorry for shouting.Just flip the blade so the edge is away from you and hold the sharpener behind the blade.Pick your angle and sweep left and right like you're shading on a line with a pencil.Don't saw across the blade. Always run along the blade, left right, handle to tip. You don't need to do long full sweeps, just keep it even.Like this it's impossible to cut yourself or scratch the flat of the knife.As the edge apexes you'll start pushing a burr over the apex.Keep flipping sides and reducing pressure until the burr reduces to nothing.If you're not getting a good edge you are either not properly apexed yet or you're using too much pressure and knackering up the apex.The last sweeps should feel like warm butter with a feather pressure.Test the edge on a single sheet of paper, that'll show you where you need to do more work.Scrub deposits off the sharpener on cardboard or a roll of paper.If you want to polish or strop the edge afterwards use a leather belt for razor steel or leather with polishing compound on it for harder steels.Yes, you can do a faster better job with ¬£300 worth of Japanese Whetstones, but come on, are you a Sushi Chef or do you just want your knives to work properly? ü§îüòÇAnyway, this is much easier to use on smaller blades and doesn't make a mess.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 January 2024

Name: Throw Throw Burrito Card Game by Exploding Kittens - A Dodgeball Card Game - Fun Family Card Games for Adults, Teens & Kids, 2-6 Players
Reviews: This game is absolutely bonkers ‚Äì and a lot of fun. It‚Äôs beautifully presented ‚Äì the game comes in a nicely made, rigid storage box that should last well. If I‚Äôm being really critical, it is a bit overpackaged, although most of the internal packaging (barring cellulose wrapping around two decks of cards) is made from paper or card. The avocados are really cute: with friendly, smiling faces and slightly bugging eyes. There are decent elements of realism too: the avocado halves are pretty much the right size for a real avocado, and one half has the stone in it, whilst the other has a hole. The two would fit together neatly, were it not for their eyes! The avocados are designed to be thrown at other players: they‚Äôre made from coated foam and are soft, squishy, and completely safe. Far less sting-y than ball pit play balls can be!The game itself is total pandemonium, in which pretty much everything you know and expect from the structuring a board/card game‚Ä¶ gets thrown out the window. Dealing is haphazard, as is game play. The rule booklet encourages you to watch a video instead of reading the rules. There are no clear turns. The game is designed to create a mess of cards dumped in other players‚Äô draw pots, instead of neat, structured piles. It‚Äôs fast, furious, hilarious‚Ä¶ and you get to repeatedly throw squishy toy avocados at people. Loved it!There‚Äôs a clever bit of marketing involved, too. The game is a sequel to ‚ÄòThrow Throw Burrito‚Äô, and includes an add-on extension game that can only be played in conjunction with the burrito game. The manufacturers make this hard to ignore: there‚Äôs a paper envelope of cards that you‚Äôre instructed NOT to open as it contains an expansion that can only be used in combination with ‚ÄòThrow, throw burritio‚Äô. I‚Äôm contrary enough to have followed the instructions here, and have not opened the envelope. At time of writing, we do not own ‚ÄòThrow, throw burrito‚Äô ‚Äì and unless one of our friends owns a set we can borrow, I think it‚Äôs safe to say that by Christmas we will have invested in the original game, because I think this will be a lot of fun if a family Christmas is back on the cards in 2021.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 August 2021

Name: Throw Throw Burrito Card Game by Exploding Kittens - A Dodgeball Card Game - Fun Family Card Games for Adults, Teens & Kids, 2-6 Players

Name: Throw Throw Burrito Card Game by Exploding Kittens - A Dodgeball Card Game - Fun Family Card Games for Adults, Teens & Kids, 2-6 Players
Reviews: This review is based on two adults and two 12 yr olds playing - we found the rules easy to pick up after a couple of read throughs of the instructions. It's a bit like a fast paced game of "go fish" with added chaos. Everyone enjoyed the game - including the adult who'd had to have their arm twisted to join in. There were soon shrieks of laughter from everyone as the shouts of "burrito war!" etc went out and we scrambled to hurl our missiles at each other (very soft, don't hurt) and dive for cover. The games don't last long so you don't have to commit to hours if you don't feel like it, but equally you can keep playing for as long as the fun lasts. If you don't want an opportunity to throw things at your family without reproach, this probably isn't for you. If you like a laugh, it probably is.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 December 2023

Name: Throw Throw Burrito Card Game by Exploding Kittens - A Dodgeball Card Game - Fun Family Card Games for Adults, Teens & Kids, 2-6 Players
Reviews: This game apparently has some rules, and there may be a strategy.However, in practice, you just slam cards down as fast as you can until you or someone else yells something, and then you throw a burrito at them, or at someone else, or you command others to throw burritos at each other.Sometimes you run around a whole building trying to either throw or evade a burrito. Sometimes you just pray to have a burrito slammed into your face and be done with it.You can console yourself from the trauma by using resting burritos as useful stress relief toys.

There were soon shrieks of laughter from everyone as the shouts of "burrito war!" etc went out and we scrambled to hurl our missiles at each other (very soft, don't hurt) and dive for cover. The games don't last long so you don't have to commit to hours if you don't feel like it, but equally you can keep playing for as long as the fun lasts. If you don't want an opportunity to throw things at your family without reproach, this probably isn't for you. If you like a laugh, it probably is.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 December 2023

Name: Throw Throw Burrito Card Game by Exploding Kittens - A Dodgeball Card Game - Fun Family Card Games for Adults, Teens & Kids, 2-6 Players
Reviews: This game is absolutely bonkers ‚Äì and a lot of fun. It‚Äôs beautifully presented ‚Äì the game comes in a nicely made, rigid storage box that should last well. If I‚Äôm being really critical, it is a bit overpackaged, although most of the internal packaging (barring cellulose wrapping around two decks of cards) is made from paper or card. The avocados are really cute: with friendly, smiling faces and slightly bugging eyes. There are decent elements of realism too: the avocado halves are pretty much the right size for a real avocado, and one half has the stone in it, whilst the other has a hole. The two would fit together neatly, were it not for their eyes! The avocados are designed to be thrown at other players: they‚Äôre made from coated foam and are soft, squishy, and completely safe. Far less sting-y than ball pit play balls can be!The game itself is total pandemonium, in which pretty much everything you know and expect from the structuring a board/card game‚Ä¶ gets thrown out the window. Dealing is haphazard, as is game play. The rule booklet encourages you to watch a video instead of reading the rules. There are no clear turns. The game is designed to create a mess of cards dumped in other players‚Äô draw pots, instead of neat, structured piles. It‚Äôs fast, furious, hilarious‚Ä¶ and you get to repeatedly throw squishy toy avocados at people. Loved it!There‚Äôs a clever bit of marketing involved, too. The game is a sequel to ‚ÄòThrow Throw Burrito‚Äô, and includes an add-on extension game that can only be played in conjunction with the burrito game. The manufacturers make this hard to ignore: there‚Äôs a paper envelope of cards that you‚Äôre instructed NOT to open as it contains an expansion that can only be used in combination with ‚ÄòThrow, throw burritio‚Äô. I‚Äôm contrary enough to have followed the instructions here, and have not opened the envelope. At time of writing, we do not own ‚ÄòThrow, throw burrito‚Äô ‚Äì and unless one of our friends owns a set we can borrow, I think it‚Äôs safe to say that by Christmas we will have invested in the original game, because I think this will be a lot of fun if a family Christmas is back on the cards in 2021.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 August 2021

We had a hilarious half and hour or so playing this the other night, unfortunately the friends I was playing it with didn't want to be in a video so I could not get any actual game play in this review video i'm afraid . I have done a quick video to show you what's in the box, and for me the comic booklet that comes with it is a very close second to the actual game and great in its own right!The idea of the game is to cover your eyes with one hand whilst trying to build blocks in sequential order with the other... well most of you are... there is an evil wombat who is trying to destroy all your towers! It is very easily as hard as it sounds... and then some! After you get to grips with the basic game there is other power card that can be incorporated into the game too. Ive done a quick video showing you what's actually in the box and I will try and get a quick vid of some game play the next time I find some players who are less camera shy... But all I can say is its great fun and I can see it being an essential family game as well as a brilliant ice breaker to take to university. Really well priced at ¬£25, all hail the wicked wombat!

Name: Exploding Kittens Hand to Hand Wombat Card Game Fun Family Card Games for Adults Teens & Kids - Fun Party Games, 3-6 players
Reviews: This is a really quick and simple party game to play. It suggests being for 3-6 players. 2 people can't play the game together however more than 6 could play. It might just get a little chaotic.At the start of the game you're all assigned the role of either a good wombat or a bad wombat. If you're a good wombat, you try to build the towers and get points at the end of the round if you've completed two or more. The bad wombats score points by ensuring that only one tower or less have been completed by the end of the round. You're team wins when you reach 3 points.How don't you know who is who? The building and knocking down is done with your eyes closed or blindfolded!There's also a definite among us vibe involved in trying to find out who the imposter like Bad Wombats are.So a fun dexterity party game for multiple people with no real age limit required as anyone can understand the principal of being good or bad and can be shown the cards so even if they can't read, they know which role they are.It's not cheap for a board game, but equally its not expensive either and is pretty averagely priced.The components are plastic but seem sturdy enough to be up to the job and not likely to break.Happy to recommend.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 January 2023

Name: Exploding Kittens Hand to Hand Wombat Card Game Fun Family Card Games for Adults Teens & Kids - Fun Party Games, 3-6 players
Reviews: Really surprised so many people found this fun - for our kids (aged 8 and 12) it just turns into carnage and just doesn‚Äôt really feel like anyone is getting anywhere. Feels like the game is skewed really heavily towards the baddies.  I like the concept and the pieces are well made but, for us, it wasn‚Äôt very enjoyable at all. Tried to encourage kids to persevere but they were bored really quickly.

Name: Exploding Kittens Hand to Hand Wombat Card Game Fun Family Card Games for Adults Teens & Kids - Fun Party Games, 3-6 players
Reviews: This is a really quick and simple party game to play. It suggests being for 3-6 players. 2 people can't play the game together however more than 6 could play. It might just get a little chaotic.At the start of the game you're all assigned the role of either a good wombat or a bad wombat. If you're a good wombat, you try to build the towers and get points at the end of the round if you've completed two or more. The bad wombats score points by ensuring that only one tower or less have been completed by the end of the round. You're team wins when you reach 3 points.How don't you know who is who? The building and knocking down is done with your eyes closed or blindfolded!There's also a definite among us vibe involved in trying to find out who the imposter like Bad Wombats are.So a fun dexterity party game for multiple people with no real age limit required as anyone can understand the principal of being good or bad and can be shown the cards so even if they can't read, they know which role they are.It's not cheap for a board game, but equally its not expensive either and is pretty averagely priced.The components are plastic but seem sturdy enough to be up to the job and not likely to break.Happy to recommend.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 January 2023

Name: Exploding Kittens Hand to Hand Wombat Card Game Fun Family Card Games for Adults Teens & Kids - Fun Party Games, 3-6 players

Feels like the game is skewed really heavily towards the baddies.  I like the concept and the pieces are well made but, for us, it wasn‚Äôt very enjoyable at all. Tried to encourage kids to persevere but they were bored really quickly.

Name: Exploding Kittens Hand to Hand Wombat Card Game Fun Family Card Games for Adults Teens & Kids - Fun Party Games, 3-6 players
Reviews:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    
We had a hilarious half and hour or so playing this the other night, unfortunately the friends I was playing it with didn't want to be in a video so I could not get any actual game play in this review video i'm afraid . I have done a quick video to show you what's in the box, and for me the comic booklet that comes with it is a very close second to the actual game and great in its own right!The idea of the game is to cover your eyes with one hand whilst trying to build blocks in sequential order with the other... well most of you are... there is an evil wombat who is trying to destroy all your towers! It is very easily as hard as it sounds... and then some! After you get to grips with the basic game there is other power card that can be incorporated into the game too. Ive done a quick video showing you what's actually in the box and I will try and get a quick vid of some game play the next time I find some players who are less camera shy... But all I can say is its great fun and I can see it being an essential family game as well as a brilliant ice breaker to take to university. Really well priced at ¬£25, all hail the wicked wombat!

Name: Mattel Games UNO, Classic Card Game for Kids and Adults for Family Game Night, Use as a Travel Game or Engaging Gift for Kids, 2 to 10 Players, Ages 7 and Up, W2087
Reviewers_name: As described would like an option to choose the colour of gel balls you get though
Reviews: Having recently introduced the classic UNO card game by Mattel to my 6-year-old, I've been reminded of the sheer joy and excitement that this game brings to the table. Right from the vibrant colours to the simple-to-grasp numbers, every aspect of this game has been designed with the player in mind.1. **Engaging for All Ages:** Although we got this for our young one, it's not just a hit with him. Family members of all ages, from grandparents to uncles and aunts, have been drawn into the UNO vortex, making our family gatherings a lot more lively and competitive!2. **Educational Yet Fun:** Beyond the laughs and the playful banter, it's been a delight to see my 6-year-old hone his colour and number matching skills. What a fantastic way to subtly integrate learning with fun!3. **Quality of Cards:** The card quality is top-notch, durable enough to withstand the occasional spill and rigorous play that's inevitable with children around.4. **Travel-Friendly:** Its compact size makes it easy to carry around, ensuring we have a trusty game on hand for any unplanned moments or while travelling.One minor point of advice for those playing with younger kids: make sure you explain the action cards (Skip, Reverse, etc.) a couple of times, as they might be a tad confusing initially. But once they get the hang of it, there's no stopping the UNO fun!In conclusion, Mattel's UNO is not just a card game; it's a bridge across generations, ensuring countless hours of family bonding and laughter. Highly recommended for everyone, and especially if you have youngsters in the house!
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 February 2024

What a fantastic way to subtly integrate learning with fun!3. **Quality of Cards:** The card quality is top-notch, durable enough to withstand the occasional spill and rigorous play that's inevitable with children around.4. **Travel-Friendly:** Its compact size makes it easy to carry around, ensuring we have a trusty game on hand for any unplanned moments or while travelling.One minor point of advice for those playing with younger kids: make sure you explain the action cards (Skip, Reverse, etc.) a couple of times, as they might be a tad confusing initially. But once they get the hang of it, there's no stopping the UNO fun!In conclusion, Mattel's UNO is not just a card game; it's a bridge across generations, ensuring countless hours of family bonding and laughter. Highly recommended for everyone, and especially if you have youngsters in the house!

If you're looking to add a dose of hilarity to your next game night, this game is an absolute must-have. Prepare to laugh until it hurts!

Name: Ginger Fox Calm Your Birds Silly Card Game | Laugh-Out-Loud Adult Fun With Friends At Party Games Night | Matching Pairs Play For Grown-Ups Based On Funny Nature Names | 3+ Players, Aged 16+ Years
Reviews: This is a game aimed at adults or at least over 16‚Äôs. If you've got people around, then this game is absolutely hilarious and relies on innuendo and simplicity.Deal out all the cards to everyone that is playing. You then look through your cards and take turns at finding pairs, and then shout them out and place then face up on the table. Then you take turns at going around the table to ask people if they have the other card to the one you might need to make a pair.The aim of the game is to avoid having the "Don‚Äôt be a Dik Dik" card in your possession at the end, whereby the only solution is to play "Don‚Äôt be a Dik Dik roulette" and take cards off the other remaining player!It's a great game for camping, journeys, parties and nights in.

Reviews: After several rounds of playing the Ginger Fox 'Don't Be A Dik Dik' card game, I'm ready to give it a hearty 4-star review. This game has been a source of much laughter and amusement, with a few caveats.The game's humor is its biggest draw. It's cheeky, playful, and often outright hilarious. The first game night with this card deck was an absolute riot, with everyone engaged and enjoying the novelty and wit of each card. The design and quality of the cards are excellent, contributing to an enjoyable gaming experience.Replayability is a strong point of 'Don't Be A Dik Dik.' You can bring it out on multiple occasions, and it's easy to get into the fun without lengthy explanations or setups. It's a great icebreaker and a fantastic way to inject some light-heartedness into an evening.However, the humor, while a significant plus, does tend to lose a bit of its charm after the first playthrough. The surprise element of the jokes and scenarios diminishes, which is common with humor-centered games. While it remains enjoyable, the repeat rounds aren't quite as uproarious as the initial experience.Also, it's worth noting the game's content leans towards adult humor. It's perfect for a night in with friends but might raise a few eyebrows in more conservative or family-oriented gatherings. It's all about knowing your audience with this one.Despite this, the game's quality, ease of play, and the sheer fun factor keep it high on my list. 'Don't Be A Dik Dik' is durable, well-crafted, and sure to bring laughter, even if it's a bit less surprising after the first round.In conclusion, the Ginger Fox 'Don't Be A Dik Dik' card game is a fantastic choice for those looking for an entertaining, adult-themed game. It's a solid 4-star game that promises and delivers many fun evenings, even if the humor becomes slightly more familiar over time. It's a staple for any game night that's not afraid of a little playful cheekiness!

Reviews: After several rounds of playing the Ginger Fox 'Don't Be A Dik Dik' card game, I'm ready to give it a hearty 4-star review. Name: UNO All Wild Card Game with 112 Cards, Gift for Kid, Family & Adult Game Night for Players 7 Years & Older, HHL33
Reviews: Hey you wild card enthusiasts! I stumbled upon the UNO All Wild Card Game, and let me tell you, my life took a turn more unexpected than a surprise party at an introvert's house!So, there I am, unboxing this deck of unlimited chaos. It's like opening Pandora's box, but instead of unleashing doom, I get 112 cards of pure unpredictability. I thought, "Great, a family game night staple!" Little did I know, it's more like a wild night in Vegas.The key feature? Every card is a wild card. I felt like a wizard holding a deck of magical mischief. No matching colors or numbers ‚Äì it's like UNO took a walk on the wild side, and I'm the tour guide through chaos.Now, picture this: Date night. I thought, "Let's spice things up with UNO All Wild." Turns out, the game is more unpredictable than my dating history. The 'Wild Forced Swap' card? Let's just say it's not a recommended icebreaker.Family game night with parents was another adventure. The 'Wild Targeted Draw 2' card became a tool for settling old scores. Mom targeted Dad, Dad retaliated. Suddenly, I'm a referee in a domestic UNO dispute.Took it to work, thinking it's a team-building exercise. Boss loved the 'Wild Skip 2' card so much he skipped me right out of the company. Fired for playing UNO, but hey, worth it.Experimented with a child ‚Äì easy, right? Wrong. Kids are tactical geniuses. The moment they learned about the 'Wild Draw 4,' they used it strategically. Now, I owe a 7-year-old five ice creams.And pets? Tried playing with a goldfish. Turns out, they're not great at holding cards. My living room turned into a fishy UNO battlefield. Let's just say, Operation Fish-Draw didn't go swimmingly.Bad feature alert: The 'Wild Swap Hands.' Used it with my cousin, and now I know more about his life choices than I ever wanted. Turns out, some secrets should stay in the deck.Quality of life upgrade? Absolutely. My social calendar is busier than ever. Why? Because UNO All Wild has made me the neighborhood UNO guru. People come for the game, stay for the hilarity.As for attractiveness to women, let's just say, nothing says charm like playing a 'Wild Reverse' card when she expects a compliment. Who knew UNO could be a love potion?In conclusion, UNO All Wild is not just a card game; it's a wild ride through unexpected scenarios. If your life needs a dash of chaos and a sprinkle of laughter, this deck is your golden ticket.Please appreciate this review with a chuckle and consider inviting UNO All Wild to your next game night. It‚Äôs basically UNO with all wild cards, which means you can change the color or make someone draw cards at any time. The game also comes with erasable wild cards that you can customize with your own rules for added excitement. If you‚Äôre looking for something different and exciting to play with your friends or family, I recommend giving this game a try.

Name: UNO All Wild Card Game with 112 Cards, Gift for Kid, Family & Adult Game Night for Players 7 Years & Older, HHL33
Reviews: Hey you wild card enthusiasts! I stumbled upon the UNO All Wild Card Game, and let me tell you, my life took a turn more unexpected than a surprise party at an introvert's house!So, there I am, unboxing this deck of unlimited chaos. It's like opening Pandora's box, but instead of unleashing doom, I get 112 cards of pure unpredictability. I thought, "Great, a family game night staple!" Little did I know, it's more like a wild night in Vegas.The key feature? Every card is a wild card. I felt like a wizard holding a deck of magical mischief. No matching colors or numbers ‚Äì it's like UNO took a walk on the wild side, and I'm the tour guide through chaos.Now, picture this: Date night. I thought, "Let's spice things up with UNO All Wild." Turns out, the game is more unpredictable than my dating history. The 'Wild Forced Swap' card? Let's just say it's not a recommended icebreaker.Family game night with parents was another adventure. The 'Wild Targeted Draw 2' card became a tool for settling old scores. Mom targeted Dad, Dad retaliated. Suddenly, I'm a referee in a domestic UNO dispute.Took it to work, thinking it's a team-building exercise. Boss loved the 'Wild Skip 2' card so much he skipped me right out of the company. Fired for playing UNO, but hey, worth it.Experimented with a child ‚Äì easy, right? Wrong. Kids are tactical geniuses. The moment they learned about the 'Wild Draw 4,' they used it strategically. Now, I owe a 7-year-old five ice creams.And pets? Tried playing with a goldfish. Turns out, they're not great at holding cards. My living room turned into a fishy UNO battlefield. Let's just say, Operation Fish-Draw didn't go swimmingly.Bad feature alert: The 'Wild Swap Hands.' Used it with my cousin, and now I know more about his life choices than I ever wanted. Turns out, some secrets should stay in the deck.Quality of life upgrade? Absolutely. My social calendar is busier than ever. Why? Because UNO All Wild has made me the neighborhood UNO guru. People come for the game, stay for the hilarity.As for attractiveness to women, let's just say, nothing says charm like playing a 'Wild Reverse' card when she expects a compliment. Who knew UNO could be a love potion?In conclusion, UNO All Wild is not just a card game; it's a wild ride through unexpected scenarios. If your life needs a dash of chaos and a sprinkle of laughter, this deck is your golden ticket.Please appreciate this review with a chuckle and consider inviting UNO All Wild to your next game night. Your positive feedback might just fund my UNO addiction! üåüüòÇ

Name: Mattel Games UNO FLIP! Family Card Game for Adults, Teens & Kids, Double-sided Deck with Special Flip Card, 112 Cards, 7 Year Old and Up, ‚ÄéGDR44
Reviews: Ladies and gentlemen, I have discovered a game that will not only test your friendships but also your ability to control your emotions. It's called UNO FLIP!, and trust me, it's a rollercoaster ride for your sanity.At first glance, you might think, "Oh, it's just UNO with a little twist." Well, my friends, it's more than a twist ‚Äì it's like UNO went on a wild bender and woke up on the wrong side of the bed.So, here's how it goes. You start with a deck of cards that's already making you question your life choices. But wait, there's more! There's a special Flip card, and it's like the Pandora's Box of UNO. When that card hits the table, all hell breaks loose.Imagine this: You're just one card away from victory, you're feeling cocky, and then someone drops that dreaded Flip card. Suddenly, you're in an alternate UNO dimension where everything is upside down, and you're drowning in cards. It's like a card game version of Inception.Now, let's talk about the chaos that unfolds when you're playing with friends. UNO FLIP! takes your friendships and puts them in a blender. You'll see your closest pals turn into devious masterminds, plotting your downfall with every flip. I've seen lifelong friendships crumble over a game of UNO FLIP!, and let me tell you, it's worth every minute.But here's the best part ‚Äì the crazy ideas on how to use this game. You can use the cards to build a house of cards and then dramatically flip the table, just like a movie villain. Or turn it into a high-stakes drinking game where every Flip card means a shot. Just don't blame me for the hangover.In conclusion, UNO FLIP! is not just a card game; it's a test of your patience, your friendships, and your ability to embrace chaos. It's like the Game of Thrones of card games ‚Äì expect betrayal, unexpected twists, and a lot of shouting. So, if you're ready for the most intense UNO experience of your life, grab a deck, and may the flips be ever in your favor! üÉèüôÉüçª

Name: Dumb Ways to Die Card Game Based on the Viral Video, Card Games for Adults | Party Games | Adult Games | Fun Games, for Families & Kids Ages 12 and up
Reviews: This is a fun little card game. My 10 year old loves the song so I got this for him for a Christmas present. We are serious board gamers and he's used to playing games with more complex rules (worker placement, engine builders etc) but I thought that this would be a nice short easy to play game. It's pretty fun as we've already played it 3 times in one sitting. It is a 'take that' game with player elimination, so for me it was more fun with just 2 players. However it's not as mean as Munchkin and the lenticular cards are darkly humorous as you kill off the beans. My son loves the cartoon illustrations and it's great to pick up and play for a few minutes to get your kid off devices. The photo shows the least gruesome 'you died' card I could find but it's cartoon humour with 'beans' instead of people so we like it. We'll be keeping and playing this one as our non-gamer friends will find the rules easy and the illustrations are great. Also it plays up to 5 people so will work for a larger group. The lenticular cards do warp over time but apparently that's not unusual and doesn't affect gameplay. The quality is lovely with linen finish on the playing cards, a custom die amd moulded insert which was a nice surprise.
Data_of_Reviews: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 December 2023

Reviews: Ok so for background..our family looks ves to play Fallguys and they are "beans" so that was an automatic good start for this game. It is really simple to play and goes pretty quick once you understand the rules. It's easy for pretty much anyone to play. We have an autistic child and a brain injured adult in our family and they got the hang of it after a round of two. We all played "nice" for the first couple rounds..then it was no hold up ng back trying to see which bean you could get out. Cute and funny for a family or gathering that has a sense of humor.
